query:
ALTER TABLE checkIns 
ADD COLUMN status ENUM('pending', 'approved', 'rejected') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending' AFTER program,
ADD COLUMN verifiedBy INT AFTER status,
ADD COLUMN verifiedAt TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER verifiedBy;
